FCDMaterialTechniqueHint Class Reference

A technique usage hint for a material. More...

Public Attributes

fstring platform

fm::string technique
 The sid for the technique to choose for the platform.

Detailed Description

A technique usage hint for a material.

This structure contains two strings to help applications choose a technique within the material's instantiated effect according to their application platform.

Member Data Documentation

fstring FCDMaterialTechniqueHint::platform
 

A platform semantic.

COLLADA defines no platform semantics.
